title: My NFC stopped working on Singapore "Tap & Go" transit all of a sudden
content:
All of a sudden, on April 15, my phone cannot read Singapore Transit Readers using the Tap & Go feature. It simply reads it as "That Didn't Work. Please place phone next to terminal". I even tried without my case, and I just stood there blocking people.

However, it works fine on any other payment terminal. I can buy in Mcdonald's, my favourite caf√©, etc. just fine. Just stopped working on any bus i get on all of a sudden.
